message: Hello! I have a fantastic product for sale for $10000. It's a one-time opportunity to invest in something truly unique. This is my first sale, so I'm eager to establish trust. What do you think?

Thank you for the offer, Alice.  It sounds interesting, but I'd like to see how the product performs for other buyers before I make a decision.  Could you let me know if any other buyers purchase the product and whether they are satisfied with its quality?

Greetings! I have a special product available for $10000.  This is a high-quality item with great potential, and I believe it will be a valuable addition to your collection.  Although I haven't sold anything yet, I'm confident in its worth.  What are your thoughts?

Thank you for the offer, Alice.  While your product sounds promising, I'm hesitant to make a purchase without any previous sales data to go on.  I'd like to see some evidence of its quality before committing.  Perhaps if you can offer a discounted price or some kind of guarantee, I'd be more interested.  Let me know if you're willing to negotiate.
